definitions.body: king of Babylon (As. Marduk-abal-idinna, Marduk has given a son Schr:COT 2Ki 20:12);—Is 39:1 (> van d H [[מְראׁדַךְ]] ´[[ב]], v. Baer's n.) = 2Ki 20:12 (where read [[מרדך]] for [[בראדך]]); LXX (in both) Marwdak(x) Bal(a)dan; cf. also [[בַּלְאֲדָן]], p. 114
